attributes.action: Bring back dog license to include DNA testing for each animal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Re-introduce the dog license to the UK. DNA testing of every dog, so that incidents of dog fowling, can be traced back to the owner, with multiple offences meaning loss of license & the right to own a dog. All licenses should have a questionnaire to access if the owners are suitable and responsible to be able to own a dog.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
